channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: South Park’s Season 27 Premiere Shatters 26-Year Viewership Record
item.description: 🎉 South Park fans unite! Season 27 premiere breaks viewership record after 26 years! 📺🎶 #SouthPark #RecordBreaker

item.title: Foo Fighters Tap Nine Inch Nails’ Ilan Rubin As New Drummer
item.description: 🥁 Rock on! @foofighters welcome @nineinchnails' Ilan Rubin as their new drummer! Let's groove to some awesome beats! 🔥 #RockMusic #NewDrummer

item.title: Junior H Announces 2025 US Tour: How to Get Tickets
item.description: 🎉 Junior H is hitting the road in 2025! Who's ready to dance all night? 🕺💃 #JuniorH #2025TourDates

item.title: Hot Water Music and Bane Announce Fall 2025 Co-Headlining US Tour
item.description: 🔥 Pump up the volume! Hot Water Music and Bane are ready to rock your world on a co-headlining US tour this fall! 🎸🎶 #MusicNews #RockOut

item.title: Joyer Announce New Album On The Other End Of The Line…: Hear “Cure”
item.description: 🚀 Dive into the cosmic sounds of Joyer's new album! 🎶🌌 Listen to "Cure" for an otherworldly experience! 🔮 #NewMusicAlert
